## About Me {.section-title}

::: {.about-grid}

::: {.about-text}
I'm a Data Scientist and AI/ML Engineer currently pursuing a **Master of Science in Business Analytics** at the **University of Miami Herbert Business School** (GPA: 3.9/4.0). I also hold a Master's in Energy Business Management and a Bachelor's in Chemical Industrial Engineering from Universidad del Valle de Guatemala.

I specialize in building **Large Language Model (LLM) applications**, **multi-agent AI systems**, and **predictive analytics solutions**. My work sits at the intersection of data science, business strategy, and AI engineering.

I'm fluent in English and Spanish, and I bring experience from companies like **The Central America Bottling Corp (CBC)**, **AB InBev (Ambev)**, and **Spectrum**, as well as collaborations with **UHealth Bascom Palmer Eye Institute** and **Deloitte**.
:::
